cause.description:
This is designed to help inform and legalize a single payer health care system to ensure health care for ALL Californians and anyone who is within the boarders of California. By supporting this movement, people are able to mobilize and help everyone ensure that they are taken care of.
1. Health care should be avaliable to all people
2. Health care should not be exclusive to those with money
cause.mission: To provide every Californian with health care
cause.name: California Single Payer Health Care
